summary: From the album of the same name by Claudio Baglioni the film tells the love story of two teenagers during the legendary seventies. A story so overwhelming as to compel the world to retreat,... See full summary »
cast: Emanuele Bosi|Maria P. Petruolo|Daniela Giordano|Mariella Valentini|Federico Galante|Claudio Cotugno|Valentino Campitelli|Giulia Amato|Veronica Corsi|Matteo Urzia|Stefano Masciolini|Veronica Bruni|Giancarlo Previati|Piero Cardano|Andrea Gherpelli|Antonio Gerardi|Ivano Marescotti|Federico Costantini|Claudia Alfonso|Domenico Diele|Francesca Graglia|Veronica Olivier|Jonathan Redavid
title: Questo piccolo grande amore
